summary: Completed testing of Hogwarts Music Studio CMS features and scroll functionality. Scroll to top working perfectly across all navigation. Careers page displays dynamic CMS content and job application flow is fully functional. Backend APIs working with 93.8% success rate. Found minor issues with admin session management and one missing CMS content item.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 400 'This email is already registered as an admin'

configuration_issues.impact: Only 3 projects found instead of expected 5+

ui_bugs.issue: careers_badge content 'Join Our Team' not displaying on page
ui_bugs.symptoms: Missing badge text in careers page header

integration_issues.issue: Admin sessions expiring during testing, redirecting to login
integration_issues.root_cause: Possible session timeout or authentication issues

passed_tests: Backend API - 30/32 tests passed (93.8% success rate)
Scroll to top functionality - ALL navigation tests passed
Home -> Services navigation scrolls to top correctly
Services -> About navigation scrolls to top correctly
About -> Careers navigation scrolls to top correctly
Careers -> Home navigation scrolls to top correctly
Careers page displays dynamic CMS content (4/5 items)
Careers page shows 'Work With Us' title from CMS
Careers page shows 'Internship Program' and 'Sound Engineers' titles
Careers page shows 'Apply Now' form title from CMS
Job application form - all 7 form fields present and functional
Job application submission flow works correctly
Job application success page displays after submission
CMS backend structure implemented with careers and applications sections
Services API returns all 6 required services
AI Chat endpoint working with proper responses
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fixes needed: 1) Fix careers_badge display on careers page header, 2) Investigate admin session management issues for better CMS testing, 3) Consider adding more default projects to meet expected count. All major functionality is working correctly.
